description:
Davis loves basketball and his lean muscular body looks to be made for the sport. The guy moves incredibly graceful, and this athlete pretty much excels at any sport he puts his mind to. He is perfectly symmetrical.
He had some rough times, so now is driven to really make an impact in his life. This is one career driven. workaholic type of guy. He must work 16-18 hour days between several jobs!
But back to his body. If you like �em lean and muscular, Davis fits the bill. He struggles to keep weight on and really has to dump the calories into the body to keep fueling his nonstop engine. He must eat about 6000 calories a day.
He loved being photographed, and we spent a good amount of time at the beach. He wanted to do some shots where his arms were up in the air, to showcase just how long and lean he is. Love these shots!
Davis seems to do everything with raw unbridled energy, including his solo. Very rarely do I get to do a solo with a guy who is so in to it. He just looks like he is having a blast. His dick is so rock hard in this film, I wanted to reach out and test it. He was hard the minute he took his shorts off, and I think I shot this film pretty much straight through. Any cuts I made were to shorten the video to fit online.
The precum kept dripping out and he loved playing with it. In fact, just before he began to bust his nut, he stretches a band of it and you can see it turns him on so much he gets.
This is a FUN hot solo. And yes, Davis will be back for more!
title: Davis - Solo
